string-array.name: shortDescription
string-array.item: Violation 101: Interior design not with regulation
Violation 102: Unapproved food premise
Violation 103: Valid permit not valid for establishment
Violation 104: Permit not shown in convenient location
Violation 201: Food not viable for human consumption
Violation 202: Food processing procedure unsanitary
Violation 203: Food cooling method unsanitary
Violation 204: Food unsafe to eat
Violation 205: Cold food stored in hazardous environment
Violation 206: Hot food stored in hazardous environment
Violation 208: Obtained food from unapproved sources
Violation 209: Food not protected from contamination
Violation 210: Thawed food in hazardous environment
Violation 211: Frozen food not stored properly
Violation 212: Use of unacceptable food handling procedures
Violation 301: Workstation unsanitary
Violation 302: Workstation not properly cleaned
Violation 303: Hot and cold water facilities not maintained
Violation 304: Pests present on premise
Violation 305: Pests can enter/harbour/breed at premise
Violation 306: Food area unsanitary
Violation 307: Equipment makes contact with undesirable surfaces
Violation 308: Equipment/utensils/food not in good working order
Violation 309: Chemicals not properly labeled or stored
Violation 310: Single use items used more than once
Violation 311: Premise not maintained properly
Violation 312: Non-essential items stored on premise
Violation 313: Live animals on premise
Violation 314: Unacceptable written sanitation procedures
Violation 315: Equipment lack accurate thermometers
Violation 401: Inadequate handwashing station
Violation 402: Employees do not wash hands properly
Violation 403: Employee lack good personal hygiene
Violation 404: Employee smoking on food area
Violation 501: Operator does not have FOODSAFE level 1
Violation 502: Staff does not have FOODSAFE level 1

string-array.name: violationDescriptionToastMessages
string-array.item: 101: Plans/construction/alterations not in accordance with the Regulation [s. 3; s. 4]
102: Operation of an unapproved food premises [s. 6(1)]
103: Failure to hold a valid permit while operating a food service establishment [s. 8(1)]
104: Permit not posted in a conspicuous location [s. 8(7)]
201: Food contaminated or unfit for human consumption [s. 13]
202: Food not processed in a manner that makes it safe to eat [s. 14(1)]
203: Food not cooled in an acceptable manner [s. 12(a)]
204: Food not cooked or reheated in a manner that makes it safe to eat [s. 14(1)]
205: Cold potentially hazardous food stored/displayed above 4 °C. [s. 14(2)]
206: Hot potentially hazardous food stored/displayed below 60 °C. [s. 14(2)]
208: Foods obtained from unapproved sources [s. 11]
209: Food not protected from contamination [s. 12(a)]
210: Food not thawed in an acceptable manner [s. 14(2)]
211: Frozen potentially hazardous food stored/displayed above -18 °C. [s. 14(3)]
212: Operator has not provided acceptable written food handling procedures [s. 23]
301: Equipment/utensils/food contact surfaces not maintained in sanitary condition [s. 17(1)]
302: Equipment/utensils/food contact surfaces not properly washed and sanitized [s. 17(2)]
303: Equipment/facilities/hot & cold water for sanitary maintenance not adequate [s. 17(3); s. 4(1)(f)]
304: Premises not free of pests [s. 26(a)]
305: Conditions observed that may allow entrance/harbouring/breeding of pests [s. 26(b)(c)]
306: Food premises not maintained in a sanitary condition [s. 17(1)]
307: Equipment/utensils/food contact surfaces are not of suitable design/material [s. 16; s. 19]
308: Equipment/utensils/food contact surfaces are not in good working order [s. 16(b)]
309: Chemicals cleansers & similar agents stored or labeled improperly [s. 27]
310: Single use containers & utensils are used more than once [s. 20]
311: Premises not maintained as per approved plans [s. 6(1)(b)]
312: Items not required for food premises operation being stored on the premises [s. 18]
313: Live animal on the premises excluding guide animal in approved areas [s. 25(1)]
314: Operator has not provided acceptable written sanitation procedures [s. 24]
315: Refrigeration units and hot holding equipment lack accurate thermometers [s. 19(2)]
401: Adequate handwashing stations not available for employees [s. 21(4)]
402: Employee does not wash hands properly or at adequate frequency [s. 21(3)]
403: Employee lacks good personal hygiene clean clothing and hair control [s. 21(1)]
404: Employee smoking in food preparation/processing/storage areas [s. 21(2)]
501: Operator does not have FOODSAFE Level 1 or Equivalent [s. 10(1)]
502: In operator’s absence no staff on duty has FOODSAFE Level 1 or equivalent [s. 10(2)]

string-array.item: All
Low
Moderate
High
